rules: In the Hat is played in 3 rounds of fast-paced guessing fun!
introduction: Players toss words or phrases into a hat and take turns drawing words. Each player gets 30 seconds to describe or act out the words on the screen. Each word scores 1 point when guessed correctly. The team with the most points at the end wins!
round1Content: Forbidden word - Say anything *except* the word itself to describe the word on the card. No cheating!
round2Content: Now that you're familiar with the words in the hat this should be a breeze! Act it out. No talking; just gestures.
round3Content: If you paid close attention in the previous rounds, you will excel here. You get one word only! Make it count.
challengeContent:
Try these twists:
Round 1: No capital-letter words (bye-bye 'I', names, countries).

Round 2: No pointing! Be the thing, not its use. Got 'Lamp'? You're glowing now.

Round 3: One sound only. If you say 'uhm'. Thatâ€™s it. Good luck, team!
